content: Not sure if it's just me but when I update notes on a game I've already played and imported it won't update in the app. Is there something else I need to do?
replyContent: When you import plays from BGG only new plays are imported. BGG plays do not have a last-modification date, so the app can't see you've updated the comment of that play. To re-import the play, delete it in BG Stats (make sure Delete in sync with BGG is turned off!) and re-import from BGG. Or edit the comment in BG Stats and turn on Auto-post.

And I have a question: if you add a play with other BGG registered user, would it sync the play info to them in their separate account on their device?
replyContent:
Thanks for you review! Expansion support is on the wishlist to add in the future. 
BGG doesn't allow you to post plays to other user's accounts, so your play on BGG will only have a link to the player's profile, but his account will not have that play. You can send the play from BG Stats to your friend (via sharing), and he can post to BGG himself.
